markers.title: Painting With A Twist
markers.notes: This art studio offers easy-to-follow painting classes for groups and individuals of all ages. A great way for Carnes residents to tap into their creative sides!

markers.title: Carnes Nails
markers.notes: Full-service manicures and pedicures right within the Carnes Crossroads community.

markers.title: Azure Carnes Crossroads
markers.notes: Completed in 2021, Azure Carnes Crossroads is the newest apartment community at Carnes. Luxury amenities and bright, modern layouts are among the many highlights of this new place to call home at Carnes.

markers.title: Pulte Homes Model Home
markers.notes: Visit the Pulte Homes team and new furnished model home at 119 Philips Park Street.

markers.title: Eastwood Homes Model Home
markers.notes: Visit Eastwood's team and furnished Model Home at 507 Wodin Place.

markers.title: Toll Brothers Model Home
markers.notes: Visit the Toll Brothers team and furnished Model Home at 509 Wodin Place.

markers.title: David Weekley Model Home
markers.notes: Visit the David Weekley Home team at their furnished Model Home at 511 Wodin Place.

markers.title: Philips Park Playground
markers.notes: The towering and c.

markers.title: Cuppa Mana
markers.notes: This local coffee shop offers specialty tea and coffee, all-day breakfast and lunch, frappes, bubble tea and more.

markers.title: Mi Fiesta
markers.notes: This casual Mexican bar and restaurant offers fresh, delicious food, great margaritas and both indoor and outdoor seating. It quickly became a favorite spot for residents when it opened in 2020.

markers.title: Refuel
markers.notes: A step above typical convenience stores, Refuel markets offer exemplified service, elevated food options and thoughtful architecture and landscaping, making this the perfect fit for our community. Opening in 2021.

markers.title: Proposed Berkeley County Public School Site
markers.notes: Developers at Carnes Crossroads are working with the Berkeley County School District to build a K-8 public school within the community.

markers.title: Bellary Flats
markers.notes: Crafted with Lowcountry living in mind, Bellary Flats has knit together the perfect blend of comfort and style in this community of luxury apartments at Carnes Crossroads.

markers.title: LowCountry Women’s Specialists
markers.notes: For over 25 years, more than 30,000 babies have been delivered by the expert doctors at LowCountry Women’s Specialists, a privately-run independent network of specialists that offers comprehensive OB/GYN services.

markers.title: Dunkin’
markers.notes: Dunkin'® is the world's leading baked goods and coffee chain, serving more than 3 million customers each and every day worldwide. Their Carnes Crossroads location offers the company's most up-to-date interior, ordering and drive through service.

markers.title: East Bay Deli
markers.notes: Hungry? Looking for tasty deli sandwiches? See why East Bay Deli was voted Charleston's best deli 13 years in a row! They feature an extensive menu of sandwiches, salads, soups, baked potatoes and more.

markers.title: Sherwin-Williams
markers.notes: No matter where you are in the world or what surfaces you're painting or coating, Sherwin-Williamsprovides innovative paint solutions that ensure your success.

markers.title: Polly’s Fine Jewelry
markers.notes: Charleston's #1 local jeweler since 1986, featuring loose diamonds, Tacori, A. Jaffe, PANDORA, TAG Heuer, Michael Kors, Elle, Charleston Gate Jewelry & more!

markers.title: Steel City Pizza
markers.notes: Steel City Pizza Company was born in Pittsburgh but raised in Charleston. They have proudly served Charleston for over 13 years, and look forward to many more. Pittsburgh is their roots, but Charleston is their home. Come to experience Steel City Pizza and all they have to offer.

markers.title: Physicians Footcare
markers.notes: Not every foot is the same. Not every condition is the same. And not every patient is the same. That’s why Physicians Footcare offers customized treatment plans tailored precisely to your specific situation.

markers.title: Palmetto Eye Institute
markers.notes: You can trust your eyes are in good hands as at Palmetto Eye Institute. Dr. Itharat has performed thousands of successful surgical procedures, and restored vision to thousands of patients.

markers.title: Cox Orthodontics
markers.notes: Cox Orthodontics provides patients of all ages with the very latest orthodontic treatment options, including Invisalign clear aligners and clear braces. Their office uses the most advanced computer technology including digital imaging and high-tech computer graphics.

markers.title: Solomon Family Dentistry
markers.notes: Since 1979, their practice has provided convenient and affordable dental care to the Summerville, Goose Creek, Moncks Corner, and surrounding Charleston areas. Solomon is a second generation family dentistry office dedicated to providing the best in dental care.

markers.title: Roper St. Francis Physician Partners Primary Care
markers.notes: Roper St. Francis Physician Partners Primary Care has internal and family medicine doctors with locations throughout the Lowcountry. Their doctors are dedicated to providing patients with excellent primary care, from routine physical exams to acute illnesses to chronic illness management.

markers.title: Carnes Crossroads Dental
markers.notes: At Carnes Crossroads Dental, dentistry is personal. Personalized dentistry is more than a nice tagline, it reflects their team’s passion to really know and understand the people they serve in the greater Summerville area.

markers.title: Summerville KinderCare
markers.notes: KinderCare offers quality childcare and education for young children in the heart of the Carnes Crossroads community.

markers.title: MUSC Health
markers.notes: Carnes Crossroads Primary Health is MUSC's Summerville area care team, specializing in family medicine (care for the whole family) and internal medicine (care for patients ages 18 and older). Patients will find thorough, accessible and complete medical care for acute illnesses, chronic diseases, and preventive health maintenance.

markers.title: Sweetgrass Pediatrics
markers.notes: Sweetgrass Pediatrics provides an individualized approach to children's medical care by looking atat medical, psychosocial, environmental and community influences as they develop a care plan for each patient.  We coordinate referral sources and resources within our community to aid in the care of our patients.

markers.title: Breastfeeding Center of Charleston
markers.notes: The board-certified team of consultants at the Breastfeeding Center of Charleston are equipped to help new mothers manage their experience with breastfeeding.

markers.title: Coastal Pediatrics
markers.notes: A designated Level 3 Patient Centered Medical Home, recognized for providing the highest level of care in the three-tiered quality grading system.

markers.title: Low Country Rheumatology
markers.notes: Low Country Rheumatology is provides patients with timely, caring service of the highest quality. As Board Certified Rheumatologists with years of clinical experience, they are qualified to manage all connective tissue diseases including rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus, scleroderma, and vasculitis; all forms of arthritis including gout, pseudogout, and osteoarthritis; bone disorders such as osteoporosis; and musculoskeletal disorders.

markers.title: Charleston GI
markers.notes: Charleston Gastroenterology Specialists, Charleston Endoscopy Center and Summerville Endoscopy Center are dedicated to the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of diseases affecting the digestive system.

markers.title: Charleston ENT & Allergy
markers.notes: Charleston's largest private ENT practice. They diagnose and treat all ages for the full range of ear, nose, throat, and head and neck conditions. Whether you need relief for seasonal allergies or a rare condition, their team of board-certified specialists is dedicated to treating you with the highest possible level of care.

markers.title: Smallcakes at Windmill Station
markers.notes: Smallcakes Cupcakery and Creamery is a cupcake and ice cream shop that uses creative flavors, quality ingredients and friendly service to provide the finest cupcake experience worthy of returning and recommending.

markers.title: ‘The Boneyard’ Dog Park
markers.notes: At Carnes Crossroads, we love our dogs and they love nothing better than a romp at the Dog Park. There are separate areas for small and large dogs, each equipped with a variety of agility obstacles, spacious runways and water stations.

markers.title: Information Center
markers.notes: If you’d like to learn more about Carnes Crossroads, the Information Center is the place to start. Come grab a drink and a map, and chat with us about what's happening in the community! The Information Center is open seven days a week, with or without an appointment.

markers.title: Northwood Academy
markers.notes: Carnes Crossroads is proud to be home to Northwood Academy, one of the area’s finest private schools. Serving grades K-12, the sprawling campus offers modern, state-of-the-art learning facilities, a new sports stadium and athletic fields.

markers.title: Northwood Church
markers.notes: The vibrant, interdenominational Northwood Church offers numerous faith-based programs including weekly worship services, ministry, community outreach and continuing studies.

markers.title: Playground
markers.notes: Fun for kids and parents alike, our playground is a great place for children and their families to gather and interact with friends and neighbors. Swings, slides, and a barn-themed playhouse provide hours of fun and exercise.

markers.title: Roper St. Francis Berkeley Hospital & Medical Center
markers.notes: Charleston's leading healthcare provider chose Carnes Crossroads as the location for the first full-service hospital in Berkeley County. Berkeley Hospital is located on a 90-acre medical campus that also includes a medical office building. The 50-bed hospital includes an emergency department, maternity and surgical services, radiology and imaging and more. It opened in 2019.

markers.title: St. James Lake
markers.notes: This beautiful freshwater lake is located in St. James Park and features the first of many waterfront properties in Carnes Crossroads. Manicured walking and biking trails provide access for all community residents.

markers.title: St. James Park Neighborhood
markers.notes: The second Carnes Crossroads neighborhood, centrally located St. James Park features beautiful St. James Lake, waterfront homes, and many of the community’s most scenic trails.

markers.title: St. Thomas Park Neighborhood
markers.notes: The first neighborhood at Carnes Crossroads, St. Thomas Park is a short walk or bike ride from many of the community’s amenities such as the pool, playground, Green Barn, and Village Green.

markers.title: Swimming Pool
markers.notes: There’s no better place to spend a hot Lowcountry afternoon with family and friends. A center of social activity for the community, the 25-meter pool features lap lanes, a beach entry area and a Splash Zone for the kids.

markers.title: The Blake at Carnes Crossroads
markers.notes: This upscale, assisted living facility provides an atmosphere of social interaction and life enrichment, with just the right amount of support. A variety of suites, programs and services of all kinds are tailored to the individual needs of each resident.

markers.title: The Green Barn
markers.notes: A well-known area landmark, the Green Barn is a symbol of the Carnes Crossroads community. Originally built on the property in the 1930’s, it has been lovingly restored and now serves as an open-air gathering place for residents. It can also be rented for private events.

markers.title: The Passage Apartments
markers.notes: The Passage Apartments offer luxury living, a sense of community and modern conveniences while retaining a home-like feel. Community amenities include a resort-style saltwater pool, cabana area, and a fitness center and yoga room.

markers.title: Village Green
markers.notes: Located in the heart of the St. Thomas Park neighborhood, the Village Green is an ideal spot for a family picnic, flying a kite, or a stroll after dinner. Due to its spaciousness and centralized location, it plays host to various outdoor events and gatherings held throughout the year.
